name: Run Dash
description:
Run Dash is a game, running along the most insane scenarios on different races. Drag to jump or slide and move left or right. Avoid touching trucks, buses and other obstacles. Run around the city, subway, forest and beach and collect all the coins you can.
In this fun running game, Player can choose among different characters to play. The store has a lot of items, which player can choose to buy to improve your performance. Run Dash also gives you the opportunity to receive great gifts. Collect your daily presents every day and open the mysterious box to get some special rewards!
Run Dash is a very interesting game. Download it now and start running!
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
